hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_DELIVERY_RECEIPT (EODE_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, EODE_WORK_ORDER_NO, EODE_WORK_NO, EODE_WORK_TYPE_CODE, EODE_WORK_TYPE_NAME, EODE_STATUS_CODE, EODE_STATUS_NAME, EODE_ORDER_NO, EODE_LOGISTIC_NO, EODE_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EODE_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EODE_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EODE_QUANTITY, EODE_GROSS_WEIGHT, EODE_NET_WEIGHT, EODE_VOLUME, EODE_DIVIDE_SEQUENCE, EODE_PROVIDER_CODE, EODE_PROVIDER_NAME, EODE_OPERATOR_CODE, EODE_OPERATOR_NAME, EODE_LOCATION_CODE, EODE_LOCATION_NAME, EODE_DELIVERY_TIME, EODE_REMARK) select SEQ_EO_DELIVERY_RECEIPT.NEXTVAL, /*EODE_ID*/ EOWO.CREATOR, /*CREATOR*/ SYSDATE, /*CREATE_TIME*/ EOWO.MODIFIER, /*MODIFIER*/ SYSDATE, /*MODIFY_TIME*/ 0, /*REC_VER*/ 0, /*REC_STATUS*/ EOWO.ORG_ID, /*ORG_ID*/ EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO , EOWO.EOWO_WORK_TYPE_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_WORK_TYPE_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_WORK_TYPE_NAME, 'NEW', '创建', EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_NO, EOWO.EOWO_LOGISTIC_NO, EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOWO.EOWO_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWO.EOWO_QUANTITY, EOWO.EOWO_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWO.EOWO_NET_WEIGHT, EOWO.EOWO_VOLUME, EOWO.EOWO_DIVIDE_SEQUENCE, EOWO.EOWO_PROVIDER_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_PROVIDER_NAME, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL from EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO where EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO =:eowoWorkOrderNo and EOWO.ORG_ID = :orgId
